text: Crystal Castles is the first studio album by Toronto-based duo Crystal Castles. The album was selected for the NME magazine's list of the 50 greatest albums of the decade, and gained #39. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Alice Glass (Vocals/Lyrics) * Ethan Kath (Music/Samples/Production) * Matthew von Wagner (Vocal Production for 3 tracks: "Alice Practice", "Love and Caring", "Xxzxcuzx Me") Category:2008 albums
title: Crystal Castles (album)
